narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Montefiore Medical Center is a Case Management provider based in Yonkers, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $72.9M in Medicaid payments across 237K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This provider appears to operate as a fiscal intermediary or management organization, processing payments on behalf of many individual caregivers. High aggregate billing is expected for this type of entity.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $72.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
